ygData.subject: odd kill stealing occurance
ygData.msgSnippet: i was in unrest and i saw something very odd. A group of mostly clerics (better killstealers than wizards against undead) and i think a paladin. i saw a wizard
ygData.messageBody:
i was in unrest and i saw something very odd. A group of mostly clerics (better killstealers than wizards against undead) and i think a paladin. i saw a wizard and a friend attempting to get fair kills while the cleric group kept stealing from them.
the group was taking both the Reanimated Hand room, and the room adjacent to it, so the wizard and his friend were completely unable to get a kill. Finally when the hand spawned the wizard was fed up and kill stole it (maybe because clerics can't dismiss undead it?) the other group completely went ballistic and shouted all over the zone that he was a killstealer and never to group with him. i observed this all from outside on the roof (if anyone has been there they'd know what i'm talking about).

i just think it's wierd how the group didn't even acknowledge that they had stolen every kill the wizard and his friend had tried to get. anyways i think it was just funny
